Blog.post: so. i've seen napoleon dynamite twice already, and i STILL don't understand what the point of that movie is. it's hilarious, don't get me wrong but... i mean.. where's the plot? hell, i've seen anchorman three times and i still can't find a plot. but it's the funniest movie i've ever seen. mmmmmmmmg i spent all my money last week to buy a tube top with jim morrison on it. i think it was well worth the $20 and 3 hours i spent at the mall. love the doors. or die. saturday we're going to the beach. son of a beach! i LOVE the beach! even texas beaches! dirty and gross water... mmmm love it!! but all i really do is check out guys. well, not anymore. i used to. but it's not like anything happened with that anyway. like i'd ever get noticed. pshh. so i got a new email address.. to forget about how i came up with kgartenppants. i'd rather forget that whole phase of my life. and that's what it was- a phase. i grew up and out of that phase. finally. welllllllllllllllllll now i'm just bored. someone leave a comment. i'm so sad. amanda says she hates me. that she's never met me but she just hates me. i cried. she really has no reason to hate me. if anything, i'm the one with the reason. but yeah, i cried and cried and cried.. and i'm so sad she doesn't like me... hah oh wait.. i'm confusing the word "cry" with "laugh". and "sad" with "happy". gah i hate it when i do that! i get a little confused. :) I LOVE BRIAN :)

does it bother anyone else that traci townsend spells the word "psyched" as "syked"?.....is it just me?... maybe cuz my mama's an english major.. i dunno, it bothers me tho my new favorite band seems to be my chemical romance. and my new favorite thing to do seems to be yelling at people from out of a car window. hey it's fun, try it sometime. especially if you pass some chicks with their windows down and you yell "heeeeey ladies!!"... and you're a girl. oh they love that! ................................... checkers are so awesome. hmg. i wish i could checker my entire car. but. anyway. check you!. later.

imagine this in song:: today i drove around we had errands to do i got my oil changed and i registered for college classes it's true so true i'm in college classes eat it today we drove so far from firestone to half price books then we went to TCC and i'm in college classes it's true so true i'm in college classes EAT IT!!!!!!!!!!! heh heh. i love it. so.. yes, i have a xanga AND a blog. is that sad? well i bought the book wise guy today. which the movie goodfellas was based on. which is the COOLEST best movie EVER. and i also got some murder books. "how to kill your ex's new girlfriend" so far all i've got is ignore her. seems to be killing her....... heh heh heh..... sinister!
